caption:
Stallman Sez:

 The Syrian Kurds in Afrin have asked Assad to defend them from Turkey. ErdoÄan warned Assad that Turkey would attack Assad. And Assad's Russian backers, too? 

 It is very strange for a breakaway part of Syria to ally in effect with Syria (and thus maybe Russia). Even stranger to ally with Syria and the US at the same time. I don't know what to make of this.
title: Syrian Kurds in Afrin
